thread.title: Chicken lays giant mutant egg with another egg inside - CNET
thread.title_full: Chicken lays giant mutant egg with another egg inside - CNET

author: Amanda Kooser
title: Chicken lays giant mutant egg with another egg inside - CNET
text:
Chicken lays giant mutant egg with another egg inside Forget unboxing videos. An egg-opening video caught the internet's attention with a bizarre secret. @akooser 
Easter came early for a chicken-raising family this year. Instead of a chocolate candy inside an egg, they got a Russian nesting doll-style surprise. 
YouTube user SNO Multimedia posted a fascinating video over the weekend showing a giant mutant chicken egg. The lumpy-looking creation dwarfs a normal egg . When cracked open, the egg reveals a yoke and another fully formed egg inside. That smaller egg also contains a regular yoke and white. More chickens Qoopy luxury day care for chickens: I want to believe 
Though the egg-inside-of-an-egg phenomenon is rare, it does happen. It's due to a counter-peristalsis contraction, which happens when an egg is pushed back up into the chicken's reproductive system and becomes embedded in another newly forming egg. It's exactly as strange as it sounds. 
SNO Multimedia's video description is an instant classic: "This gigantic egg had a yolk and another egg inside. I can't believe it didn't kill my hen. No one wanted to eat it, so my wife made a hair conditioner with it." At least the hen's monumental effort didn't go to waste.
